Hey guys  these past few weeks  me and some admins realized how thetoxicity in this group chat has increased exponentially. I get that SCM is not that well reputable with its moments such as photos being stolen or such  but itdoesnâ€™t give yâ€™all the right to harass others for their opinion.Weâ€™ve hadcountless complaints on the rowdiness of this group chat  with some of thefirst few supporters of this group chat even leaving after being harassed continuouslyevery time he says something. The reason why Iâ€™ve never really put my foot down on this issue is ever since the previous incident I had with this group chat  Iâ€™ve never really focused on the problems here as I thought it would solve itself  but clearly thatâ€™s not the case.I get that sometimes it may be completely jokes to you guys  but I hope yâ€™all also consider the other partyâ€™s point of view. After all  this is supposed to be a group chat for new people to come in and know more about our car scene. Yes  the new people may be annoying  or sometimes plain stupid  butus being unwelcoming or trying to gatekeep whatâ€™s left of the â€œgood old timesâ€ will not avoid the inevitable moment where more â€œkidsâ€ will discover the scene here.I really donâ€™t want to micromanage  especially like what someone previously said: itâ€™s like Iâ€™m trying to handle primary school kids. But this is my chatroom after all  so I have to maintain a standard of it  and I hope you guys can understand. As such  Iâ€™ll have toimpose on the rules of this chatroom a bit more for the peace of this chatroom  lo. I hope yâ€™all can improve a bit  donâ€™t have to attack anyone for an opinion thatâ€™s different than what others would say.Other than that  I will alsoimprove on the admin lineupand will make sure no incidents will happen again with them related to abuse or such. But yeah  I hope yâ€™all can cooperate too  lo. Every day got argument  how can like thatâ€¦ Thanks a lot for reading if you did.
